topic.title: Copyeditor
topic.section:
The Copyeditor edits submissions to improve grammar and clarity, works with authors to ensure everything is in place, ensures strict adherence to the press's bibliographic and textual style, and produces a clean, edited copy for the Layout Editor to turn into the galleys that will be in the published format of the press. Some presses have an Editor or Acquisitions Editor play this role.

More information can be found {help_topic key="editorial.copyeditorsRole" text="here"}.
